title: IN MIDNIGHT CLAD
description: Having fought countless campaigns of terror in complete darkness, the Night Lords know how to make an ally of the shadows.
rules: Use this Stratagem in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when a NIGHT LORDS INFANTRY unit from your army is targeted by a shooting attack. Until the end of that phase, when resolving an attack against that unit, subtract 1 from the hit roll.

title: VOX SCREAM
description: Hideous screams of an aggressive techno-virus infiltrate the communication systems of the target, temporarily rendering it incapable of command.
rules: Use this Stratagem at the end of your Movement phase. Select one enemy unit within 18\" of any NIGHT LORDS units from your army. Until the start of your next Movement phase, enemy units cannot be affected by any of the selected unit’s aura abilities.

title: PREY ON THE WEAK
description: Striking at the will of their victims, the meek of mind are the quarry of the VIII Legion.
rules: Use this Stratagem in your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, when a NIGHT LORDS unit from your army is chosen to shoot or fight with. Until the end of that phase, when resolving an attack made by a model in that unit against an enemy unit whose models have a lower Leadership characteristic than the attacking model, add 1 to the hit roll.

title: HIT AND RUN
description: There is no honourable fight, only darting strikes, feigned retreats and all manner of dirty tactics to win the battle.
rules: Use this Stratagem at the start of your Charge phase. Select one NIGHT LORDS unit from your army. That unit can charge even if it Fell Back this turn.

title: WE HAVE COME FOR YOU
description: When the Night Lords descend, there is no mercy.
rules: Use this Stratagem at the start of your opponent’s Movement phase. Select one NIGHT LORDS unit from your army that is not a VEHICLE. Until the start of your next turn, enemy units within 1\" of that unit cannot Fall Back unless they have the VEHICLE or TITANIC keyword, or have a minimum Move characteristic.

title: FROM THE NIGHT
description: The sons of Nostramo strike from the dark.
rules: Use this Stratagem at the start of your Charge phase. Select one NIGHT LORDS INFANTRY unit from your army that is entirely on or within a terrain feature. Until the end of the turn, when a charge roll is made for that unit, add 2 to the result, and when resolving an attack made with a melee weapon by a model in that unit, add 1 to the hit roll.

title: RAPTOR STRIKE
description: Raptor cults circle above their prey, then descend when their victims are otherwise afflicted.
rules: Use this Stratagem in your Charge phase, before making a charge roll for a NIGHT LORDS JUMP PACK unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield as reinforcements this turn. Roll 3D6 for that charge roll instead of 2D6.

title: FLAY THEM ALIVE
description: Death does not always follow defeat.
rules: Use this Stratagem in the Fight phase, when an enemy unit is destroyed as a result of an attack made by a NIGHT LORDS model from your army. Until the end of the turn, when a Morale test is taken for an enemy unit within 12\" of that NIGHT LORDS unit, your opponent must roll one additional D6 and you can choose one of those dice to be discarded.
